RT @cmarinucci Trump today: "Someday, we have to come together and do bipartisan, and hopefully it will happen soon."
Trump earlier this week: 👇👇👇👇 https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/940567812053053441 QT @realDonaldTrump Lightweight Senator Kirsten Gillibrand, a total flunky for Chuck Schumer and someone who would come to my office “begging” for campaign contributions not so long ago (and would do anything for them), is now in the ring fighting against Trump. Very disloyal to Bill & Crooked-USED!
This tax bill was written for Republicans’ wealthy campaign contributors. I want to congratulate my Republican colleagues for their honesty about that.
